item.title: Alpine Linux as a DHCP and DNS Server
item.description: dnsmasq is a lightweight, easy-to-configure DHCP and DNS server. I’ll demonstrate how to set up dnsmasq as both a DHCP and DNS server on a Linux system. Procedure Procedure Network Card Configuration : Network Card Configuration 1 ip address The physical interface eth1 is used to set up DHCP and DNS services. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 cat >> /etc/network/interfaces << EOF auto eth1 iface eth1 inet static address 192.
